title: Megazone 23
synopsis: Shougo Yahagi is a young motorcycle enthusiast living in a world of hot bikes, hard rock, and J-pop idols. The general populace go about their lives in peace, under the watchful eyes of a computer program in the guise of pop idol sensation Eve, unbeknownst to them. Shougo himself is mostly concerned with riding his motorcycle and picking up beautiful women like Yui Takanaka, who aspires to be a dancer.
characters: ['Yahagi, Shougo', 'B.D.', 'Takanaka, Yui', 'Takanaka, Eiji', 'Narahara, Ryo', 'Yumekanou, Mai', 'Tokimatsuri, Eve', 'Dump', 'Dominique', 'Rayna']
